name: MYSTERIES OF THE ANCESTORS
description:
Nobody knows what the ancient cave drawings mean, or do some people know ? well one family has kept the secrets of the drawings hidden in a book for years. Until now when one uncle revealed the location of the book to the evil ones to gain riches but he was killed before he could get his reward

Now the last blood line descendant has been warned by his ancestors to take the book out of the village because the evil one has sent his army to come and get the book.

follow on twitter - @Ma22ka_games
